Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I feel more comfortable asking AI questions compared to asking a teacher. I found the clarification made by so to be more helpful. Sometimes it can be hard finding time to ask teachers for help as there are so many students

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Both feedbacks were very useful in helping me improve my work. I found AI would feedback to be more broad compared to the teachers answers

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Sometimes I’m conflicted trusting the AI as it doesn’t really have all the context necessary to provide feedback. One of the key differences is that I need to provide a lot of context when asking for the feedback. Whereas with a teacher they have all the information needed to help with feedback
